article.headline: Rider 54, St. Peter's 53
article.story: JERSEY CITY, N.J. (AP) -- Junior forward Jason Thompson hit a 2-pointer with just 4 seconds left on the clock to lift Rider over the top in a 54-53 win over St. Peter's on Monday night. Thompson, a junior forward, shot 4-for-11, with a total 17 points. Sophomore guard Lamar Johnson led scoring for the Broncs (10-11, 6-5) with 6-for-13 shooting, with a total 19 points. St. Peter's (3-18, 1-10) led 34-22 at the end of the first period. But Rider then doubled its shooting game in the second period, hitting 48 percent, verses about 23 percent in the first period. Junior guard Raul Orta led the Peacocks, shooting 5-for-10 for 14 points.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
